title: Zombie Ryze Rework
body:
As you guys know the new zombie skins are really awesome (gj rito) but as for Zombie Ryze,he does not have any cool animation/sound effect etc.I have emailed rito about giving Zombie Ryze a rework and adding animations/sound effects to him so that he can be on par with the slayer/zombie series skins.They actually agreed that he does need a little rework.I have plenty of ideas that can help Zombie Ryze on the radar with the other zombie skins.(Pls no negative comments ^_^  :* 

The way he walks is just like any other ryze skin, now I advice to keep that so that when his ult is activated he actually changes the way he walks and turns into a really hungry-manner zombie and if rito can add sound effects like when he ults he screams "BRAINS" that would be awesome.

For his Q just a regular zombie spit would do

For his E  just like the q (regular green zombie spit) 

For his W a group of zombie hands arises from the ground to snare the enemy

So to summarise


Q - Single Green Zombie Spit

W- Zombie Hands Arise From The Ground To Snare Enemy Champion

E- Still Green Zombie Spit

R- He Changes The Way He Walks And Starts Sprinting (Since He Gets Movment Speed Buff) Like A Hungry Zombie,

Let me know what you guys think of these ideas.Hate them? Like them?

replies.body: I agree those changes would be nice, but it would most definitely not fit his 975 price tag, as skins with that many changes are generally 1350 - 1820 rp in price.
